import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import { clearItemFromCart } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem:{name,imageUrl,price,quantity}}) => (
{name} {quantity} {price}
✕
) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ clearItem: item => dispatch(clearItemFromCart(item)) }) export default CheckoutItem;
